text: The Province of Prato () is a province in the Tuscany region of Italy. The capital of the province is the city of Prato. It was formed from part of the province of Florence in 1992. The province has an area of 365 kmÂ² and a total population of 227,886 (2001). There are 7 comune (municipalities) in the province. == Comuni and population == Municipality Population Prato 182,038 Montemurlo 18,044 Carmignano 12,930 Vaiano 9,645 Poggio a Caiano 9,167 Vernio 5,853 Cantagallo, Italy 2,841 == Famous people born in Prato == * Birthplace of Italian football legend Paolo Rossi. == Other websites == * Province homepage
title: Province of Prato
